definition: to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
to sell/to reach (a price in an auction)
to offer for sale/to sell/to sell out or betray
to resell at a profit/to speculate
to work hard/to do one's very best/to throw oneself into the task at hand

sentences.english: On the third floor they are selling linens.
Went to Centurymart with Tom, buying a bag of cookies at bakery.
sentences.chinese: 今天和小洋去联华，在卖面包的地方买了袋饼干。

sentences.english: Yes, I sell high rate discharge lifepo4 batteries.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我卖的高倍率磷酸铁锂电池。

sentences.english: The man took it and asked what he had to pay his shave.
sentences.chinese: 卖扫帚的人拿回了扫帚，随后问修面要付多少钱。

sentences.english: Pinocchio was not able to walk, therefore, the boss sold him to an old drummer.
sentences.chinese: 木偶行唔到，于是老板就卖左比个老鼓手。

sentences.english: We find the bus stop, which fortunately has a dumpling'n'soup lady present.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了车站，很幸运的那里有一个卖饺子的女士。

sentences.english: So he swore an oath to him, selling his birthright to Jacob.
sentences.chinese: 以扫就对他起了誓，把长子的名分卖给雅各。

sentences.english: The dealer sells each cat for about 50 yuan (US$7.31) to restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 这些猫贩子以每只猫50元人民币的价格卖给餐馆。

sentences.english: The judge enjoined him from selling alcohol.
And a big number of cars are still sold around the world because of their look.
sentences.chinese: 而世界上很多车依然是在卖外观。

sentences.english: He buys new and sells when the warranty runs out.
sentences.chinese: 他买新车开，一过保修期就卖。
那也别忘了推着小车卖面条。

sentences.english: The family that sold it to Mr. Gittes had turned it into a warren of apartments for various relatives.
sentences.chinese: 卖给吉茨的这家人把它变成了众多亲属居住的大杂院。

sentences.english: The peddler bawled his wares in the street.
sentences.chinese: 为他们卖的货物大声叫卖的人。

sentences.english: Bob Sugg read only certain bits of the papers he sold.
sentences.chinese: 在鲍勃萨格卖的报纸中，他只看一小部分。

sentences.english: Jesus replied, "The one who has dipped his hand into the bowl with me will betray me.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣回答说，同我蘸手在盘子里的，就是他要卖我。

definition: to sell/to reach (a price in an auction)
to set up a vendor's stall in the street
to set up a stall/to maintain a large staff and organization
